org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.trafficblocks.tmc.tmcimport
Class TMCImportStatus

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.trafficblocks.tmc.tmcimport.TMCImportStatus

public class TMCImportStatus
extends java.lang.Object

Helper-class to store the status of the currently running import permanently.

setImported

public void setImported(char aClass,
                        int aLocationCode,

                        long aOSMentityReverseID,
                        org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.EntityType aOSMEntityType)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Mark the given TMC-entity as having been imported.

Parameters:
aClass - 'L'ine, 'P'oint or 'A'rea
aLocationCode - the TMC-entity
aOSMentityForwardID - the id (forward-direction) of the one of the OSM-entities representing this TMC-entity
aOSMentityReverseID - the id (reverse-direction) of the one of the OSM-entities representing this TMC-entity
aOSMEntityType - the type (orginal value of the ENTITYTYPE-enum) of the one of the OSM-entities representing this TMC-entity
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if we cannot store the status
